description.displayText: We have used Liandra as a baby sitter once so far and will certainly do so again.  My daughter liked her very much -- she didn't want her to leave!  She was also confident and warm with my eighteen month old son (even though he has been sick and was a little more reserved than normal).  Finally, she was punctual, and good about reporting back to us how things were going.
description.originalText: We have used Liandra as a baby sitter once so far and will certainly do so again.  My daughter liked her very much -- she didn't want her to leave!  She was also confident and warm with my eighteen month old son (even though he has been sick and was a little more reserved than normal).  Finally, she was punctual, and good about reporting back to us how things were going.

description.displayText:
I have nothing but good things to say about Liandra. I normally have someone from my family babysit for me. I was in a bind and needed to find a sitter for me to go out during the evening. Liandra's profile and experience lead to me doing a brief phone interview, after which I asked her to babysit my daughter. 

Liandra was professional, warm, kind, engaging and patient. She arrived on time and immediately began engaging my 11-year-old daughter in conversation. The minute she stepped into my home, I knew I had made the best decision. I was nervous about hiring essentially a stranger to care for my daughter. Liandra put my nervousness at ease. 

My daughter was so happy and had so many wonderful things to say about Liandra. They talked about school, her friends, her interests and her favorite TV shows. When I asked my daughter what did you like about Liandra she said: "She understood me."

I would recommend Liandra to anyone looking for childcare services.

description.displayText: I was skeptical about hiring a babysitter at first because my kids have only been taken care of by family. I'm happy that the kids had a good time with her and were very comfortable.
description.originalText: I was skeptical about hiring a babysitter at first because my kids have only been taken care of by family. I'm happy that the kids had a good time with her and were very comfortable.

description.displayText:
Liandra watched our 4 year old son while we were on vacation in New York.  She was very understanding and provided information during the interview.  She was even kind enough to offer suggestions on managing my sons independence in a way that would give him confidence, help him safely test boundaries and be less stressful for us as parents.  
The next morning my son asked if Liandra was coming back.  He enjoyed their short time together and it shows how much Liandra put into a short term job.  She made sure my son was in bed on time as we had a early flight.  I appreciate her punctuality and effort.  I will definitely look forward to booking her again if we are vacationing in the NY area again.

description.displayText: she is really respectful and great with putting down the children before you get home. I was very pleased.
